nickname: KATU Hope for the Holidays Telethon
customContent:
Give Hope for the Holidays!

Homelessness hurts, especially during the holidays. You can end the pain of homelessness and hunger. Give a hot, holiday meal to a hungry man, woman or child today!

Your gift today gives hope to so many people in our community, as well as the first steps to a second chance in life.
